Summary •	Qualified professional with cumulative experience of 14.5 years, comprised of about 4 years of SAP FICO functional experience and 10.5 years of domain experience in Accounts and Finance. 
•	8 month of T&E [travel and expenses] Exp. – Configuration, Testing & Defect Management  
•	Two ‘Full life cycle’ project Implementation experience with Testing & post “Go-Live” support. 
•	8 month of In-house Cash. Implementation – Testing & Defect solutioning  
•	Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to interact with Management, staff & client at all levels. 
•	Possess excellent conceptual & working knowledge in SAP FICO and core Financial Accounting. 
•	Analyze client’s business requirement and identify the areas for improvement to provide viable business solutions through SAP. 
•	Worked out various business scenarios through integration with other integrated modules of SAP namely Human Resource, Material Management and Sales & Distribution modules. 
•	Got good hands on experience in FICO-Basic Configurations, Testing & support.

Summary SAP FICO Senior Functional Consultant with more than 8 Years of SAP experiene of working in different business verticals or domains with competent knowledge and expertise in Finance, Controlling, Costing, and profitability analysis and ability to deliver projects with including designing , developing and validating end to end SAP ERP solutions. 
 
Having SAP expertise on processes and integration of processes related to MM , SD , CS and PS with FI/CO and Management Accounting etc... 
 
SAP R/3 Finance specialization in GL , AP , AR, Banking, Automatic payments and developing enhancements in foreign outgoing payments and equally comfortable with handling the basic configuration under cash management and Funds Management and Budgeting. 
 
SAP R/3 Controlling specialization in CO-CCA, PCA, IO , Allocations , activity costing , COPC,COPA and planning and budgeting. 
 
Specialities includes command on SAP FI/CO , Business processes with exposure to various business verticals , business analysis, and financial analysis. Experience SAP FI/CO Functional Consultant Infrastructure Ontario April 2011  –  October 2012  (1 year 7 months) Canada I was involved in Full Life Cycle Implementation using ASAP methodology in the project in which my role revolved around blueprinting, the realization phase/configuration, final preparation and post go live support for all the implementations. I configured FI global settings, company code, created GL accounts, defined posting keys, maintained field status variants and assigned to company code, screen variants for document entry as per business specifications and tested the configuration in various scenarios. Customer account groups, terms of payment, tolerance limits for customer payments, special GL indicators, dunning, and down payments. Configured automatic payment program for out-going payments in A/P. I managed foreign currency valuation at the period end. I coordinated with CO, MM and SD module teams for configuration of interfaces and coordinated with the technical team for development of ABAP reports. I also prepared user documentation for training.
